com.soa.alert.reporter

Interface RootCauseCondition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AlertCondition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExceptionCondition

    public interface RootCauseCondition
extends AlertCondition
    This extensiob of the AlertCondition interface allows stacks of contitions to be traversed in order to determine the cause of any particlar condition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RootCauseCondition getCause()
      Get the condition that caused this

      • Methods inherited from interface com.soa.alert.reporter.AlertCondition

        getCode, getDefaultMessage, getParameters

    • Method Detail

      • getCause

        RootCauseCondition getCause()
        Get the condition that caused this
        Returns:
        The condition that cause this or null if this is the root cause.
